oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Herrington Sisters performances - 1946-03-22
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various performances featuring the Herrington Sisters (performers) recorded on March 22, 1946.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Herrington Sisters
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Test tone -- (00:48) Goin' Back Home (Herrington Sisters) -- (02:35) Riding For The Rancho Tonight (Herrington Sisters) -- (04:50) Goin' Back Home (Herrington Sisters) -- (06:30) Steal Away To Jesus (Herrington Sisters) -- (08:35) Tumbleweed Town (Herrington Sisters) -- (11:05) Rolling Drifting Sand (Herrington Sisters) -- (12:58) I'm Depending Lord On You (Herrington Sisters) -- (15:43) Chant Of The Wanderer (Herrington Sisters) -- (17:35) Holy Be Thy Great Name (Herrington Sisters) -- (19:33) Silent Trail (Herrington Sisters) -- (21:52) Oh My Lord, I Heard Somebody Calling My Name (Herrington Sisters) -- (24:27) The Covered Wagon Rolled Right Along (Herrington Sisters) -- (26:29) My Adobe Hacienda (Herrington Sisters) -- (28:00) Closing theme and statement
